events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their vehicle and a street pole on 2024-05-30 in the downtown area.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and related keywords.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to manage the case and communicate with the customer.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the insured confirming receipt of all initial information and claim numbers.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, collision report, and driver's license for further processing of the claim.
Customer successfully submitted all requested documents including police report and vehicle repair estimate.
The auto claim investigation commenced with assignment to the adjuster to verify damages and liability.
Investigation concluded confirming the insured's fault with damages fully documented and verified.
A settlement amount based on repair quotes and policy terms was proposed to the claimant for approval.
Customer expressed appreciation for the timely updates and responsiveness during the claim handling process.
Claim approval was granted after confirmation that all terms and documentation were satisfactorily met.
Payment was issued to the customer covering all agreed settlement amounts for the vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following payment and confirmation of repair completion.
All relevant documents and case files were archived for future reference under the insured's policy.
